item.title: Plotting deprivation in Scotland, using geofacet and sf in R
item.description: library(tidyverse) library(sf) library(readxl) library(geofacet) map_scot <- st_read("../data/scot_gov_data/data_zone_shapefiles/.") ## Reading layer `SG_SIMD_2016' from data source `C:\Users\callu\Dropbox\blog\content\data\scot_gov_data\data_zone_shapefiles' using driver `ESRI Shapefile' ## converted into: POLYGON ## Simple feature collection with 6976 features and 49 fields ## geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON ## dimension: XY ## bbox: xmin: 5513 ymin: 530252.8 xmax: 470323 ymax: 1220302 ## epsg (SRID): NA ## proj4string: +proj=tmerc +lat_0=49 +lon_0=-2 +k=0.9996012717 +x_0=400000 +y_0=-100000 +datum=OSGB36 +units=m +no_defs data_postcode_simd <- read_excel("../data/scot_gov_data/00505244.xlsx", sheet = 2) data_simd_ranks <- read_excel(".
